amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the international programs of the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $6 million and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce nuclear energy allocation by $6,000,000 and increase the spending reduction account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Harris.
